channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: GOP-led states push for unfettered school aid as Trump promises a smaller federal role in education
item.description: Governors in several Republican-led states are pressing the Trump administration to cut the strings attached to their federal education aid, a goal conservatives have long dreamed of that now appears within reach as President Donald Trump moves to dismantle the Education Department.

item.title: Fired federal workers face choices now that a judge wants them rehired
